message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.CR 

This paper is primarily focused on action recognition in surveillance videos, which falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of zero-shot learning, which is a popular topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The authors also mention the use of web-scale video data, which could potentially fall under the multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the challenges of collecting real-world videos due to legal restrictions and privacy protection, which could be relevant to the cryptography and security (cs.CR) sub-category.
